titleStmt.title: Anglorum lacrimæ in a sad passion complayning the death of our late soueraigne Lady Queene Elizabeth: yet comforted againe by the vertuous hopes of our most royall and renowned King Iames: whose Maiestie God long continue.
Celestiall elegies of the goddesses and the Muses
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Thomas, 1573 or 4-1609 or 10.
Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. White] for T. Pauier, and are to be solde at the signe of the Catte and Parrets neare the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Plagiarized, by Richard Johnson, from STC 21225: Rogers, Thomas. Celestiall elegies of the goddesses and the Muses.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
